shortdesc.ph: Creates a Stream object for sending and receiving audio and video.

section.p: You can call this method multiple times to create multiple IChannel objects, and then call the methods in each object to join multiple channels at the same time.

After joining multiple channels, you can subscribe to the audio and video streams of each channel at the same time; however, only one audio and video stream can be released on one channel at the same time.

ul.li: The parameter does not have a default value, please make sure to set the parameter value.
Please do not set this parameter to an empty character "", otherwise the SDK will return ERR_REFUSED(5).
The method is successfully called and returns a pointer to the object.
If the call fails, returns NO.
